Attribute.Name: AverageCost
Attribute.Description: Current Average Cost of the item. This is the new average cost.

Attribute.Name: BuyerOrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: Buyer Organization Code of the order received.

Attribute.Name: ChangeInInvValue
Attribute.Description: Change in Inventory Value. Amount by which the inventory value is increased due to the receipt.

Attribute.Name: EnterpriseCode
Attribute.Description: Enterprise Code of the order received.

Attribute.Name: InventoryValue
Attribute.Description: Current Inventory value of the item. This includes the change in inventory value due to this transaction.

Attribute.Name: ItemID
Attribute.Description: Item Id of the item getting received.

Attribute.Name: OrderNo
Attribute.Description: Order Number of order getting received.

Attribute.Name: PostingClassification
Attribute.Description: Posting Classification of the item received

Attribute.Name: PrimarySupplier
Attribute.Description: Primary Supplier of the item received.

Attribute.Name: PrimeLineNo
Attribute.Description: Prime Line No. of the order line received.

Attribute.Name: ProductClass
Attribute.Description: Product Class of the item received.

Attribute.Name: Quantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity received.

Attribute.Name: SellerOrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: Seller Organization Code of the order received.

Attribute.Name: ShipNode
Attribute.Description: Ship node that received the item.

Attribute.Name: ShipmentNo
Attribute.Description: Shipment Number.

Attribute.Name: SubLineNo
Attribute.Description: Sub Line No. of the order line received.

Attribute.Name: TransactionType
Attribute.Description:
For purchase order: TransactionType='RECEIPT'
For return order: TransactionType='RETURN'

Attribute.Name: UnitOfMeasure
Attribute.Description: Unit Of Measure of the item received.

Attribute.Name: UnitPrice
Attribute.Description: Unit Price of the order line received. This represents the cost of each unit

Attribute.Name: CostFactorGroupName
Attribute.Description: Name of the LANDED Cost Factor Group used to calculate the average cost. Each cost factor group will have the collection of cost factors.

Attribute.Name: Cost
Attribute.Description: Calculated Cost value to be applied (Based on the calculation method and application method).

Attribute.Name: CostApplicationMethod
Attribute.Description: Application Method of the Cost factor that is applied to calculate the average cost.

Attribute.Name: CostCalculationMethod
Attribute.Description: Calculation Method of the Cost factor that is applied to calculate the average cost. (00-PERCENTAGE,01-AMOUNT)

Attribute.Name: CostFactorName
Attribute.Description: Name of the Cost factor that is applied to calculate the average cost.

Attribute.Name: Uom
Attribute.Description: Unit Of Measure of the Cost factor value that is applied to calculate the average cost.

Attribute.Name: Value
Attribute.Description: Value of the Cost factor that is applied to calculate the average cost.
